ComicInfo.Title: Murder in Mint Condition; Moving Stiffs; A Night at the Rose Petal
ComicInfo.Summary:
In "A Night At The Rose Petal," cover artist Mike Ploog, writer Mike W. Barr, and artists Rick Magyar and William Messner-Loebs offer a lovely homage to The Spirit in honor of its 50th Anniversary!
In "Moving Stiffs," Gabe Webb finally moves into Jennifer Mays' brownstone -- to uncover the maddening mystery of a man found dead in Gabe's packing box! The story, illustrated by Allen Curtis, continues the storyline from The Maze Agency #15.
Plus: "Murder In Mint Condition," the rare comic convention Maze Agency story, is featured here complete in color for the first time! It's illustrated by Adam Hughes and Rick Magyar!
